Review.Contenu: Absolute garbage, I have no clue why anyone would use this for example instead of disquis which is free iirc.Main issues:90% of the time I can't login because they apparently don't believe in passwords for some reason and I have to wait a hour before I get an email where I can sign in and after that I can finally leave a comment, great.Automatical login doesn't work, it opens a pop-up window saying "singing you in, this window will close in few seconds" yet it doesn't actually sign you in and never closes.Also they may randomly delete your account and just make you a new one with everything reset. (yes this happened to me)If I were to make make a slogan for this service it would be something like: FastComments, making commenting a pain, and after singing in you won't even remember what you wanted to say.

Despite everything being easy to follow, in practice, none of their tools worked. And the support was unhelpful and stopped responding to genuine questions about implementing the product or getting around the issues. They then had the nerve to ask for a review AFTER going radio silent.This is that review. Good product in theory, bad in execution, so average at best.

Review.Titre: I would leave a 10-star review if it…
Review.Contenu: I would leave a 10-star review if it were available. From an initial pre-sales enquiry to having FastComments working on my Squarespace site and my existing Squarespace comments imported in a matter of hours. Second-to-none customer support by Devon, who was polite, incredibly helpful and FAST at replying to my emails. It felt like real-time chat! I'm delighted with the experience as a customer, and the plugin looks amazing on my site, so I couldn't be happier.

Some members were having a problem with setting up their account to use the comments on a gated platform. Within minutes of submitting my support request, I had a response and the developer worked with me to - well, he did ALL the work - to create a seamless experience. It's my second experience with their support and both times they've been fast, friendly and quick to implement or help me with a solution. I'm a fan! Thanks, Devon for your outstanding service!

Review.Contenu: Faced with the problem of searching for a widget with a comment, we searched for a long time and found what we needed. In 2 days we were able to collect all the necessary look and functionality of the comments widget, the technical support is the best, they respond quickly and for nits there are no problems that they cannot solve. I recommend it to everyone, the widget is worth using all the time.

I really love FastComments. This has incredible potential to be used in online courses, live streamed challenges, etc. I love how seamlessly it integrates, and how easy it is to set up and customize. As a web designer, I also really appreciate the ability to have CSS-level control over the UI. I will for sure be coming back to FastComments for other projects still, and also recommending it to my clients. Great work!

When I was building my personal site/blog I spent quite some time looking for the best way to add comments, including building my own, but eventually landed on FastComments. The key aspects that won me over are that it has a ton of features, doesn't require commenters to create accounts, offers a React library, and collects as little data as possible. In addition their support is super responsive and helpful.

I am so happy with the easy installation, robust, up-to-date, and user-friendly documentation (I am not a developer), and many customization options. The UI (design/how it looks) is simple but pleasing. Privacy and security were also very important to us, as well as the option for anonymous commenting.
